name: Ayko's Source of Balatro
subtitle: Balatro Steam on IOS for cross save.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find Balatro.

apps.name: Balatro
apps.subtitle: The poker roguelike. Balatro is a hypnotically satisfying deckbuilder where you play illegal poker hands, discover game-changing jokers, and trigger adrenaline-pumping, outrageous combos.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome game only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: App needs FaceID permissions for user-defined settings
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App needs permission to save pages in your photo library
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses camera to take photos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: App uses microphone to record video.
